Room.Name: Second Floor West Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the second floor of Kista Towers in the west hallway.
Room.LongDescription: On the west side there is an office with the door slightly ajar. This is not as well lighted an area as the rest of the hallway, but a bright light comes from under the office door. Odd that you cannot hear anything, though. Maybe there is nobody in there.
